package.name: GoneDark2_Message_Style
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
This is a modification of GoneDark. Author: "I really love this theme, but i wanted the font to be larger and more futuristic-looking, so i made this variant of it just for that purpose."
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=7151
